body:
Fixes #10599 

@anderbubble Can you test this? I want to make sure:

1. It does detect the LLVM-enabled compilers
2. It doesn't add 2 copies of the compiler, one with and one without `-llvm`

Also, can you confirm that all of the flags are the same as for PGI, not LLVM?
title: Fix detection of LLVM-enabled PGI compilers
